page.topic: Set Variable to Constant or Expression Result
page.description: The Set Variable to Constant or Expression Result action stores a constant or expression result in a variable.

step.description: Choose whether the variable is a New variable or an Existing variable.
If you selected "New Variable", enter the Variable Name.
Select the Scope of the variable. The options are:

case.description: "Shared" - the variable is available to scripts based on the underlying form or browse
"Global" - the variable is available to other scripts

step.description: Select the Type of the variable. The options are:
In the Set Value To field enter the data or expression that defines the variable's value. Optionally, click the 'xy' button to open the Expression Builder.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.
